content.rendered:
Take Boston Dynamics’ Spot for a walk. Attendees will have an opportunity to drive Spot at the Robotics Summit & Expo. Spaces will be limited for this unique experience and will be able to be booked through the event app.

Visit Boston Dynamics at Booth 149
